document.full_text: tunisia's prime minister suggested sunday that july elections for an assembly to draw up a new constitution could be delayed, potentially fuelling unease among anti-government protesters over the path to democracy.
document.title: tunisian pm raises possibility of vote delay
lines_and_colors: tunisia's prime minister suggested sunday that july elections for an assembly to draw up a new constitution could be delayed, potentially fuelling unease among anti-government protesters over the path to democracy.
